snippet: The stories in this collection for young adults are set during the winter holidays, but their real subject is relationships.
abstract: Ellen Hopkins reviews book My True Love Gave To Me: Twelve Holiday Stories, collection of short holiday stories for young adults, edited by Stephanie Perkins.
